skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Through my experience in numerous different classes I've had the opportunity to build different websites, GUIs, and other front-end applications. Each project provided a unique challenge and allowed me to explore various technologies and design principles. From creating responsive layouts with HTML, CSS, and React to enhancing user interactions with JavaScript, I've honed my skills in crafting intuitive and visually appealing interfaces.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Throughout my career, I've garnered extensive experience working with a diverse array of programming languages and technologies, leveraging them to architect robust solutions. Notably, I have demonstrated proficiency in Java and C++, crafting intricate programs and systems to meet varied demands.

portfolio.title: Nexus Project Management System
portfolio.description: Nexus is a comprehensive tool designed specifically for software engineers to facilitate project and task management while integrating and enforcing Scrum principles within their workflow.

portfolio.title: Dela-Where? Exploration Website
portfolio.description: Independently developed 'Dela-Where,' a comprehensive website dedicated to spotlighting Delaware's historical significance and offering an extensive guide to local attractions and activities.

portfolio.title: Design Patterns - Java Development
portfolio.description: While learning the fundamentals of software engineering, I spent a lot of time learning design patterns. These have been great when it comes to creating reusable code that works well, and was perfect for use in projects such as the Nexus Management System.
